elements.name: User can view and close the About Us modal

steps.name: I am on the DemoBlaze homepage
I click on the About us link
the About Us popup should appear
I should be able to close the popup

name: About us
description:
In order to learn more about the company
  As a user on the DemoBlaze website
  I want to open the About Us modal and view its content

elements.name: Choosing a Category

steps.name: I am on the homepage
I click on the Monitors category
I should see only the two monitors

elements.name: Removing a Product from Cart

elements.name: Quantity Changes when Product is added twice

I click on the "Nexus 6"
I am on the product detail page
I Add the item to cart twice
